pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.3: Atha kho aññataro upāsako yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.6: Atha kho so upāsako aññatarassa āpaṇikassa gharā kahāpaṇassa sappiṃ āharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.10: Atha kho so upāsako yena so āpaṇiko tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ āpaṇikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.11: “na kirāyyo, ayyāya sappinā attho, telena attho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.12: Handa te sappiṃ, telaṃ me dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.13: “Sace mayaṃ, ayyo, vikkītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ puna ādiyissāma, kadā amhākaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vikkāyissati;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.14: sappissa kayena sappi haṭaṃ, telassa kayaṃ āhara, telaṃ harissasī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.15: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:6.16: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.3: atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:11.2: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:11.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:11.7: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:12.1: Aññe aññasaññā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:12.2: Aññe vematikā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:12.3: Aññe anaññasaññā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:13.1: Anaññe aññasaññā anaññaṃ viññāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:13.2: Anaññe vematikā anaññaṃ viññāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
